name: Brick Breaker Bonanza Beta
description:
This is my biggest project to date!  Brick Breaker Bonanza is now in beta!

With this release, there are only two levels to play through.  In the full release version, there will be about 100 levels, multiplayer versus, multiplayer co-op, different backgrounds, different ball colors, implemented power-ups, a story and so much more!

To play, just hit the ball with your paddle.  Arrow keys and AD keys work to move the paddle.  Spacebar may be needed to launch the ball.  Enjoy!
